short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the power of your bookmarks!  Effortlessly filter, sort, and organize your favorite websites with Starmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
•  Smart collections for advanced categorization
•  5-star ratings and visit tracking for all your most-loved bookmarks
•  Drag select and edit multiple bookmarks at once
•  Full backup support with data export and download
•  Dark mode theme option for a sleek browsing experience

Transform your bookmarking experience and never lose track of an important website again!
